meanings.definition: The action of bringing something to an end.
meanings.sent1: The termination of the movie left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: The termination of the contract was expected after the breach.
meanings.sent3: The termination of the game was abrupt but exciting.
meanings.sent4: The termination of the journey marked a new beginning.
meanings.sent5: The termination of the meeting was a relief for everyone involved.

meanings.definition: The end of a word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: The termination of the sentence was clear and concise.
meanings.sent2: The termination of the paragraph signaled a new idea.
meanings.sent3: The termination of the story was unexpected but satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The termination of the conversation left a lingering thought.
meanings.sent5: The termination of the chapter concluded the book perfectly.

meanings.definition: The act of firing or dismissing an employee from a job.
meanings.sent1: The termination of the employee was handled professionally.
meanings.sent2: The termination of the staff member was necessary for the company.
meanings.sent3: The termination of the worker led to a new opportunity.
meanings.sent4: The termination of the colleague was a tough decision for the manager.
meanings.sent5: The termination of the team member was a topic of discussion among coworkers.
